title: Courgette and mushroom tart
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '250g plain flour', '1 egg', '100g butter', 'salt, to taste', 'herbes de Provence, to taste', 'For the filling', '2 small courgettes, grated', '1 tablespoon butter', '6 mushrooms, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '120ml double cream', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons chopped dill', '100g grated cheese']
